text:
July 2, X9$9
Dr. Maurice F. Seay, Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
2$Q Chanplon Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Dr. Seays
Enclosed is the draft of a press release which Dr. Skomia asked us
to prepare announcing the receipt of the new grant from the W. K. Kellogg
Foundation.
Please make any suggestions for changes in the news release and we will
gladly incorporate them. We have tried to keep the release simple and
brief. It will be sent to the trade press, the national wire services
and certain of the larger newspapers in the country. Naturally, the
grant will also be publicised in our own NAEB Newsletter in the August
issue.
Sincerely,
HEH} JO
Enclosures
Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
